txt_en: Nothing happens until something moves.
txt_cn: 无为必将无获。
author: Albert Einstein

txt_en: The wisest mind has something yet to learn.
txt_cn: 就算最聪明的头脑也需要学习。
author: George Santayana

txt_en: Things do not change. We change.
txt_cn: 万物并没有改变，变的是我们。
author: Henry David Thoreau

txt_en: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
txt_cn: 生活就是实验，实验的次数越多你就做得越好。
author: Emerson

txt_en: Life doesn't get easier or more forgiving; we get stronger and more resilient.
txt_cn: 生活从未变得更加轻松或宽容，是我们在一点一点变强、变坚韧。
author: Steve Maraboli

txt_en: You will never be able to escape from your heart. So it's better to listen to what it has to say.
txt_cn: 既然无法逃避自己的心，不如就好好地听听它在说些什么。
author: Paulo Coelho

txt_en: The best way out is always through.
txt_cn: 找到出口的最好方式就是一路走到底。
author: Robert Frost

txt_en: Ideas shape the course of history.
txt_cn: 想法影响着历史进程。
author: 约翰·梅纳德·凯恩斯

txt_en: It's supposed to be hard. If it wasn't hard, everyone would do it.
txt_cn: 要做成一件事情本来就不容易，要是不难，岂不是谁都会去做？
author: 《红粉联盟》

txt_en: Give light and people will find the way.
txt_cn: 给予光亮，人们就能找到前方的路。
author: Ella Baker

txt_en: All your lights are red, but I'm green to go.
txt_cn: 你哪怕示以红灯拒我前行，我也会心向绿灯一刻不停。
author: Troye Sivan

txt_en: Do not linger to gather flowers to keep them, but walk on, for flowers will keep themselves blooming all your way.
txt_cn: 不要流连于采集花朵，只管向前走，一路上自会有百花盛开。
author: 泰戈尔

txt_en: People grow through experience if they meet life honestly and courageously.
txt_cn: 如果人诚实、勇敢地面对生活，就能从经历中获得成长。
author: 埃莉诺·罗斯福

txt_en: I have crossed oceans of time to find you.
txt_cn: 我跨越了时间的瀚海来把你寻找。
author: 《惊情四百年》

txt_en: You can't sweep other people off their feet, if you can't be swept off your own.
txt_cn: 如果你自己都不欣赏自己，别人也不会为你倾倒。
author: Clarence Day

txt_en: Not having the best situation, but seeing the best in your situation is the key to happiness.
txt_cn: 快乐的关键在于，即便境遇不是最佳，但依然能看到处境中最好的一面。
author: Marie Forleo

txt_en: Never does nature say one thing and wisdom another.
txt_cn: 自然与智慧永不相悖。
author: Juvenal

txt_en: Why are you trying so hard to fit in when you are born to stand out？
txt_cn: 你本就生而不凡，为何还要拼命去融入大众呢？
author: 《水瓶座女孩》

txt_en: Do you know that there's still a chance for you？Cause there's a spark in you.
txt_cn: 你知道吗？你还有机会，因为你心中藏有火花。
author: Katy Perry, "Firework"

txt_en: It is by acts and not by ideas that people live.
txt_cn: 人依靠行动而活，而非想法。
author: Anatole France
